issue.title: [Website] Use Jekyll 4 and webpack to support Ruby 3.0 or later
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11486](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11486). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
See https://github.com/apache/arrow-site/runs/1786669028?check_suite_focus=true for example. This started failing when the default ruby version increased from 2.7 to 3.0. Pinning the ruby version to 2.7 fixed it (https://github.com/apache/arrow-site/pull/92/commits/b1b8c4fc9138b28ede427967e37da70e12670969); maybe that's good enough?
